units.name: CVA
units.notes: Heavy Carrier. Fighters are F14s (8) and A10s (7); see (302.352). Can never be converted to use A20s due to balcony.

units.name: SCS
units.notes: Space Control Ship Fighters (302.352) are threesquadrons: F14 (8), F18 (6), A20 (10).

units.name: CVL
units.notes: Medium Carrier, Single Ship Carrier, Scout; (4EW:2AF)(1EW:6AF)

units.name: CVB
units.notes: Medium Carrier; 6 fighter factors until Y172; (302.352). No early variants.

units.name: CVBv.2
units.notes: Medium Carrier; 6 fighter factors until Y172; (302.352). No early variants.

units.name: BP+
units.notes: Heavy Battle Pod; max 3 in service.

units.name: VP
units.notes: Medium Carrier pod; max 3 in service.

units.name: VAP+
units.notes: Heavy carrier pod (heavy pod), max 3 in service.

units.name: PDUv.2
units.notes: See (508.1) and (431.2).  For conversion from PGB, see (441.3).

units.name: BATSv.2
units.notes: Battlestation. See EW Chart. See (433.41), (441.0), and (510.3). ModuleLimits: 2 FTM or one FTM +1 PFM.

units.name: SBv.2
units.notes: Starbase. See EW Chart. See (433.41), (441.0), and (510.3). ModuleLimits 4FTM+2PFM.

units.name: PDUv.2
units.notes: See (508.1) and (431.2).  For conversion from PGB, see (441.3).

units.name: CV
units.notes: Heavy True Carrier; single oversized squadron. Treated as Medium Carrier (interdiction) from Y176 onward.

units.name: UH
units.notes: Medium True Carrier; one oversized squadron.

units.name: VP
units.notes: Carrier Pallet for tug or LTT; max 2 in service.

units.name: PFP
units.notes: PF Tender Pallet; Scout; (EW=2); max 2 in service.
